application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of part single storey, part two storey rear extensions at lower ground and upper ground floor levels; installation of rooflight to rear roof slope, replacement roof tiles, guttering and pipework, removal of first floor rear window, landscape alterations and raising of garden wall.
decision_conditions: <span id="docs-internal-guid-0dc53710-7fff-7c8b-9125-a84c24a35e71"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to use of the extensions hereby approved the works of infilling the non original window to the rear elevation, removal of satellite dish and antenna, reinstatement of chimney stacks and pots on side elevation and replacement of roof covering with natural Welsh slate shall be implemented in full.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure the development enhances the significance of the locally listed building and conservation area.&nbsp;</span></p><br></span>

<p>None of the following shall be fixed to the external faces of the building unless shown on the hereby approved plans:</p><p>Soil stacks, soil vent pipes, plumbing, pipes, flues, vents or ductwork, grilles, satellite dishes, aerials, meter boxes, security alarms, lighting, security or other cameras </p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest of the locally listed building and Conservation Area&nbsp;</p>

<p>Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</p><p>REASON: To provide sustainable urban drainage and manage surface water run-off and enhance biodiversity values</p>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-00da0eab-7fff-dbdf-8467-e8d279702212"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Detailed drawings and/or full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, prior to the relevant part of works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first use of the development and retained in perpetuity.</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">a) Samples(to be provided on site) and/or manufacturer specifications of all facing materials to be used in the development </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">including, but not limited to the bricks, slates, coping materials and rainwater goods,</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">b) </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of the proposed rooflight including manufacturer’s specification and detailed plans</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">c) </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Detailed plans and manufacturer’s specifications of approved windows and external doors&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">d) Detailed plans and/or samples of the roofing material to the flat roof of the extensions hereby approved.</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure the development safeguards the character and appearance of the host building and Conservation Area. </span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
